description:
Keroro and company do everything they can to get the masked Dororo to show his mouth, a sight they`ve never seen before. Later, Mois`s pen pal from space visits her on Earth and intends to carry out an old promise to help her friend destroy the planet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo Kamen no Otoko de Arimasu
Dororo, the Man of the Mask / Mois, Black Visitor
ドロロ 仮面の男 であります / モア 黒い来訪者 であります
